description: Exact Bender-Canfield method per Wernicke (2005) Section 3
observed_note: Observed concentrations come from full enumeration of connected triads in the original graph (ESU), not from sampled triples.
z_score_note: Z-scores are included for reference; Wernicke (2005) reports ratios of observed to expected concentrations. Z can be extreme when expected variance is tiny.
